WorkItem.ClosedComment: This was intentional, both the racial abilities are being handled on the back end now
WorkItem.Description: Just like blood frenzy, Berserking (the troll racial) was removed from the hunter rotation, just like the orc racial. However, it was not added to the list of buffs (as of 3.3.0), unlike the orc racial. Here is the current information on that ability: http://www.wowwiki.com/Berserking
WorkItem.Summary: [Hunter] Berserking (troll racial) removed from rotation and not added under buffs
